long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create flashcard-like quizzes for you to train while you browse. Make learning enjoyable to do for long periods of time, even hours! 

features:
 * pause and unpause videos with each question, even if they're in an iframe or maximized
 * create multiple decks and switch between them on the fly
 * sound system will reward you or play a penalty sound if enabled
 * set different quiz intervals to suit your needs
 * create a note to aid memory when you get it wrong in the style of Memrise
 * remove individual questions from circulation on the fly

changelog:

0.1.1 changed max storage from 4kb to infinite
0.1 release
